body.name: Kate Lynn "Rise From the Ashes Phoenix Necklace Made with Crystals from Austria, 18"+2" Necklace, Packaged with Jewelry Box, Valentine's Day Gift Birthday Gift for Women, Symbol of Luck and Renewal
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 35 mins
features: ♥ Rising Phoenix Necklace ♥ Phoenix symbolizes rebirth and eternity, and is also representative of hope, brighten up your life with this gorgeous women necklace, just like the rising Phoenix.

♥ Jewelry Gifts for Women Teens ♥ A small gift carries heavy love. This crystal necklace is beautifully packaged with a jewelry box and ready for gift giving, Makes a surprise for any awesome lady, great gift for women or teens on Christmas, Birthday, Anniversary, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Graduation, etc.

♥ Specification of the Phoenix Necklace ♥ Pendant size: 0.9"*1.8"; Necklace chain length: 18"+2" extender; Sparkling crystals from Austria; All the metals we use are lead free, nickel free and hypoallergenic, passed Swiss SGS inspection standard.

♥ Elegant and Eye-catching Crystal Necklace ♥ This unique women jewelry made of sparkling crystals from Austria, which reflect the light beautifully, and make the necklace a fashionable everyday accessory. A glamorous addition for some important occasions or a charming gift for ladies.

♥ Excellent Customer Service ♥ To Ensure Your Complete Satisfaction, We Offer a 90 Day Money Back Guarantee & 12-Month Free Replacement for Quality-Related Issues. Kate Lynn 100% guarantees your satisfaction. Any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us, Thank you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brighten up your life with this gorgeous rising phoenix jewelry. Phoenix, a mythical bird of great beauty, it shines with light and shatters the darkness with its calm brilliance. It symbolizes renewal and the hope for a better future. Success is the ability to go from one failure to another with no loss of enthusiasm. Accept what was and what is, and you'll have more positive energy to pursue what will be.

About Kate Lynn Kate Lynn offers a selection of high-quality jewelry products, young and vibrant, exclusive and avant-garde. The diverse jewelry of Kate Lynn is the perfect accessory for any occasion and reveals your unique sparkle. Get noticed with this phoenix jewelry – a stand out elegant piece. Unique design, the phoenix will glitter romantically, upgrading your daily outfit. Set with AAAAA quality crystal from Austria, for an added shimmering luster. Adjustable necklace chain length from 17 to 19 inches. All Kate Lynn Jewelry packaged with an elegant jewelry box, perfect gift for women or Teens on: Birthday Christmas Mother's Day Valentine's Day Anniversary, etc.

Crystals from Austria Austria crystals are famous for its delicate cut and brilliant, which is suitable for the design and creation of Jewelry. Professional Design We have professional design team and production factory. From design to sales, we strictly control the quality and service. Product Details High-quality materials and manufacture craft make jewelry look more refined. The phoenix jewelry glitters romantically, upgrading your daily outfit.
Welcome to our store located in Paris, the romantic capital of the world.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EVEN MORE GORGEOUS IN PERSON!
reviews.reviewText: Eye catching sparkle. Perfect size pendant. First day wearing it, but craftsmanship seems to be spot on. Arrived beautifully and safely boxed. Can ship direct as a gift and presentation would still be stunning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! Wow! Wow!
reviews.reviewText: I just received my necklace today (Volcano) and when I opened the box it took my breath away. This pendant is so beautiful and the craftmanship is amazing. Looks very expensive!!! I love it. This will be my everyday piece to wear from now on!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pendant is even prettier than the picture. The chain is durable and a nice length. My grand daughter loves this beautiful necklace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This necklace is just beautiful. It was a gift and I wear it often.
reviews.reviewText: This necklace in the aurora borealis color is just lovely and I love to wear it! It is a great item for the money, very well made and it would make a great gift for anyone you love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful. Mild coloring. Short chain.
reviews.reviewText: Love this very much but as others said, the color is not as vibrant as that pictures and the chain is shorter than i would like. Otherwise amazing. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good looking though is not as vibrant as expected
reviews.reviewText: Very attractive and an interesting "medium" size. The color is not as vibrant as shown in the advert but still good looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and beutiful
reviews.reviewText: The sparkle of the pendant is unreal. I have bought and returned various pieces of jewelry because the actual pieces didn't look nearly as nice in person as the photos, but this one is different. I ordered more, and the matching earrings too, because it looks so beautiful and well made. You don't have to hold it up to the light at a certain angle to make it shine. It just sparkles at all times and the play of color is breathtaking. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rising from the ashes
reviews.reviewText: My sister almost died last year. She was in intensive care for a month and the doctors were amazed she lived. I bought her this for Christmas and told her she was a phoenix that had rose from the ashes. She loves it! It came in a beautiful box and the colors are absolutely gorgeous!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Lovely item fast delivery great price
reviews.reviewText: Lovely item fast delivery great price
